data.text:
Remember My Name is a 1978 American drama thriller film directed and written by Alan Rudolph, and starring Geraldine Chaplin, Anthony Perkins, Moses Gunn, Jeff Goldblum, and Berry Berenson. It was released on October 1, 1978.

Premise[]

Just released from prison, a young woman arrives in town to start a new life but inexplicably begins to stalk a married construction worker.

Cast[]
